import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' const Pesquisa = () => { const save = async () => { const form = { Nome: 'aaa', email: 'bbb', whatsapp: 'ccc' } const response = await fetch('/api/save', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(form) }) const data = await response.json() console.log(data) } return (
